original_title: Rarely Seen Bas Jan Ader Film
overview: Rarely Seen Bas Jan Ader Film', by New York-based artist David Horvitz - the centerpiece of his exhibition of the same name at 2nd Cannons Publications - is one of these homages: a five-second video featuring a grainy black-and-white film clip of a man riding a bicycle into the ocean - an allusion to Ader's famous film 'Fall II, ' in which he rides a bicycle into an Amsterdam canal, as well as to the nature of his presumed death.
title: Rarely Seen Bas Jan Ader Film
